name: nodetime
description: An app to teach me node
author: Ben Roaman <benroaman@gmail.com>

scripts.js: cp src/app.js dist/app.js && find src/** -type f -name '*.js' ! -name 'app.js' ! -name 'jquery.js' ! -name 'lodash.js' ! -name 'init.js' -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 cat -- >>dist/app.js && cat src/js/init.js >> dist/app.js
scripts.init: npm run scss && npm run js
scripts.watch: npm run init && npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:js & node app.js
